name: Green Energy Pioneers
title: Lowest reliance on fossil fuels for electricity
description: In 2021, Nepal produced only 0.0004% of its electricity from oil, gas, and coal sources, showcasing its commitment to renewable energy.

name: Minimal Carbon Footprint
title: Lowest CO2 emissions from energy sectors
description: Nepal's CO2 emissions from fugitive emissions and the power industry were both recorded at a minimal 0.0001 Mt CO2e in 2023 and 2018, respectively.

name: Tech Imports Under Control
title: Low percentage of tech-related service imports
description: In 2023, communications, computers, and related services accounted for only 0.99% of Nepal's service imports, indicating a self-reliant tech sector.

name: Stable Financial Sector
title: Strong financial sector rating
description: Nepal's financial sector received a CPIA rating of 4 in 2023, reflecting a stable and robust financial environment.

name: Peaceful Nation
title: Minimal internal displacement due to conflict
description: In 2017, Nepal reported only 2 cases of new internal displacement due to conflict and violence, highlighting its peaceful domestic environment.
